Class.name: FileSha256Computer
Class.summary: Default implementation for computing SHA-256 hash values for files.

Instance.name: ComputeHashAsync[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Computes the SHA-256 hash value for the specified file asynchronously.
Instance.param: The path of the file for which to compute the hash.
Instance.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is the computed SHA-256 hash value.

Instance.name: ComputeHashesAsync[IEnumerable<EntryPath>]
Instance.summary: Computes the SHA-256 hash values for the specified collection of files asynchronously.
Instance.param: The collection of file paths for which to compute the hash values.
Instance.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is a dictionary mapping file paths to their respective computed SHA-256 hash values.

Instance.name: ComputeHashesAsync[IEnumerable<EntryPath>,Boolean]
Instance.summary: Computes the SHA-256 hash values for the specified collection of files asynchronously, optionally using tasks for parallel processing.
Instance.param: The collection of file paths for which to compute the hash values.
A flag indicating whether to use tasks for parallel processing.
Instance.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is a dictionary mapping file paths to their respective computed SHA-256 hash values.
